name: That's What She Said
description:
Its kind of a memory game for the WeeklyGameJam#106 where you need to finish tasks in a set time(Only mouse controls)

Your wife is mad because you forgot to do the chores she asked you to do.
To do a task you need to pick an item (It will be red if picked) and to pick an action, then finish a minigame. If you did what she asked you to do before she gets home you win.
